body:
## Michael Shea
#### [mshea88@gmail.com](mshea88@gmail.com) | [https://github.com/michaelshea88](https://github.com/michaelshea88) | [https://www.linkedin.com/in/mshea2](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mshea2)
![headshot](http://www.focr.org/sites/default/files/michael_shea_0.jpg)
### About Me
I am a data analyst with a strong background in research, statistics and machine learning. I have authored numerous peer-reviewed journal articles on health policy topics and have extensive experience cleaning and analyzing large data sets. See below for a list of my publications and portfolio projects. 

### Publications
“Use of FDA-Approved and Laboratory Developed Tests in Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer.” Pers Med Onc (2016).
“Impact of breakthrough therapy designation on cancer drug development.” Nat Rev Drug Discov (2016).
“The Historic Framework for Personalized Medicine in Oncology.” Pers Med Onc (2016).
“Regulatory decision-making meets the real world.” Sci Transl Med (2015).
“Use of multiple endpoints and approval paths depicts a decade of FDA oncology drug approvals.” Clin Cancer Res (2013).
